seniority_level.evidence: Despite 'Associate' title, responsibilities include team leadership, enterprise application design, complex data migration projects, and advanced technical requirements that align with senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data gathering, storage, processing, database integration, and API development

sub_specialty.evidence: Job explicitly mentions 'both batch and real-time processing', data replication mechanisms (CDC), and covers multiple data engineering domains including migration, API development, and search applications

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions 'Leads the team to adopt right tools' and collaborating with diverse teams, indicating technical leadership without direct reports mentioned

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'Develop/Convert the database (Hadoop to GCP)' and GCP is the primary target platform throughout the job description

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only GCP is mentioned as the target platform, no other cloud providers referenced

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job description explicitly states 'both batch and real-time processing' and mentions various data replication mechanisms including CDC

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools or platforms mentioned in the job posting

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions Hadoop (data lake patterns) conversion to GCP (could be BigQuery warehouse or Cloud Storage), suggesting both lake and warehouse approaches

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Hyderabad, Telangana, India' with onsite work model requirement

timezone_focus.evidence: Location in Hyderabad, India places this in the APAC timezone region (IST)

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite requirement in specific location (Hyderabad) implies need to relocate or already be based there

h1b_friendly.evidence: Job location is India, making H1B (US visa) not applicable; no visa sponsorship mentioned

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Job location is India, making US student visas (OPT/CPT) not applicable for this position

citizenship_required.evidence: No specific citizenship or work authorization requirements mentioned for India location

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employment at IBM (large corporation) suggests traditional W2 employment structure

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career paths, growth opportunities, or advancement potential in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaboration with diverse teams but no specific mentorship or learning from senior staff

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion, advancement, or career growth paths

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, promotion ladders, or advancement paths mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Required Technical And Professional Expertise' (13 must-have skills) and 'Preferred Technical And Professional Experience' (10 nice-to-have skills)

scope_definition.evidence: Focused data engineering role with specific technical responsibilities around data platforms, migration, and processing - not a multi-role hybrid position

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (database migration, cloud conversion, API development, team leadership) are reasonable and appropriate for senior data engineer level
